BECCS

beccs is a Brooklyn based singer/songwriter from Boston. With an evolving alternative style, beccsâ€™ sound is in the realm of Regina Spektor meets Fiona Apple meets Annie Lennox. Her music delves into the dark and intimate with a voice that is just as vulnerable as it is dramatic. After a successful Indiegogo launch, she is finishing up her debut EP with acclaimed recording artist and producer Richard Barone and Grammy-nominated audio engineer Steve Addabbo. Her original song Unfound Beauty co-written with Hernan Olalla in Spain is featured in Yellow Heart, a short film which premiered this May at Cannes Film Festival. The song is the title track on her upcoming EP, Unfound Beauty.
